content.rendered:
Directed by Vijay Krishna Acharya

Written by Vijay Krishna Acharya

Cast Aamir Khan (Firangi). Amitabh Bachchan (Khudabaksh). Lloyd Owen (John Clive). Katrina Kaif (Suraiyya). Satyadev Kancharana. Fatima Sana Shaikh (Zafira). Terence J. Rotolo (British Officer). Ronit Roy (Mirza Sikander Baig). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub (Shanichar (as Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub)). Joe Azzopardi (Ship Captain). Deshna Dugad (Young Zafira). Sharat Saxena (Maharaja Sangram Singh). Ketan Karande (Bhima). Shaji Chaudhary (Bhure Lal). Ila Arun (Jaitumbi). Kaivalya Chheda (Baniya Lalaji). Naushaad Abbas (Mirza’s Advisor). Anthony Edridge (Ship Captain). Kavita Ghai (Mallika Bi). Saqib Ayub (Rebel). Amir Malik (Villager Agheera). Gavin Marshall (Capt James Powell). Sumit Khanna (Jagvendra). Bilal Hossein (Thug). Bharat Bhatia (Baniya Seth). Roman Jankovic (Captain Cut Throat). Vikas Shrivastav (Daroga). Dominie Till (Makeup Artist). Bane Kovacevic (Market Thief). Sharad Joshi (Aslam). Vicky Dutt (Rebel). Khalida Jan (Ammi). Arafatur Rahman. Jason Shah (EIC Officer). Umair Patel (Musical Artist). Abdul Quadir Amin (Azhar Ali). Pardeep Singh Rajput (Khufiya sainik (as Pradeep Singh Rajput)). Jayshankar Tripathi (Baniya (as Jayashankar Tripathi)). Vikas Sharma (Rebel). Chander Mohan (Freedom fighter). Saaquib Ayubi (Rebel). Aamir Yaseen (Rebel). Karan Anand (Rebel). Suryaveer Singh (Shopkeeper). Parmanand Ramdev (Guard). Anirban Gupta (Shipmaster). Junaid Ahmed (Baniya). Russell Paul Franklin (British Soldier). Mayank Mishra (Rebel). Nadeem Bhatti (Booking Clerk). Shoaib Khan (Guard). Vikas Srivastava (Daroga). Bilal Ahmed Reshi (Rebel). Rajesh Salhotra (Rebel). Dev Dave (Wine Boy). Shakti Rawal (Chunni Lal). Akash Nath Sisodiya (Spy). Uday McLean (Ticketmaster). Syoji Choudhary (Bhurelal). Jean-Charles Andrieux (Sam (uncredited)). Tyrone Aviet (Dancer in Vashmalle (uncredited)). BalÃ¡zs Farkas (Kal (uncredited)). William Erazo FernÃ¡ndez (Slave (uncredited)). Kevin-Briffa (Harbour worker / malta (uncredited)). Richard Bhakti Klein (Ship Captain (uncredited)). Shane John Kruger (Officer (uncredited)). Surendra Pal (Pavan Ji (uncredited)). Mirko Quaini (British Officer (uncredited)). Manjit Singh (Ashok (uncredited)). Venkat Vadisetti (Ram Shankar (uncredited))

Language Hindi. English

Producers Winston Azzopardi. Aditya Chopra. Kulthep Narula. Bharat Rawail. Sanjay Shivalkar. Aashish Singh. Gurpreet Singh

Production Latina Picture. Yash Raj Film
